UnitDefinition.Name: Adjustment factor distribution method types
UnitDefinition.Description: Accepted justment factor distribution method types. Controlled terminology.

Unit.Name: LogNormal
Unit.Description: Lognormal distribution with parameters a and b and offset c (default c = 0).

Unit.Name: LogStudents_t
Unit.Description: Log Students-t distribution with parameters a, b and c and offset d (default d = 0).

Unit.Name: Beta
Unit.Description: Beta distribution with shape parameters a and b on interval [c, d], (default = 0, 1).

Unit.Name: Gamma
Unit.Description: Gamma distribution with shape parameter a and rate parameter b with offset = c (default = 0).
